fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force one player to fight another in the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first target will be forced to use their highest-tier attack on the other.
- Your first target will appear suspicious if investigated by the Sheriff.
- If your first target has no attack, you will give them a Basic Attack to use on the other player.
- Your first target will only know they were controlled. Optionally, you may notify them that they were Manipulated instead.
- If your first target still fails to kill the second, you will kill the first target yourself.
- You only visit your first target, not the second, even when Empowered.
- If Empowered, both of your targets will attack each other, and both will appear suspicious.
- Conversion and Redirect Immune
